data.message: Acessing news feed problems error  unaviable. Facebook's automotive robots are unintelligent morons when it comes custom personalization needs. They haven't a clue in recognizing attention to personal details helping us out. They just do what ever they see fit and move on in complete ignorance. This is why Facebook's programmers themselves are the best bet have to step in personally to explain what you could be wrong working with you fixing the problem once and for all.
